name: My First Hiphop Jam
description:
This is a tech demo of a rap battle game idea. Uses Reality on the Norm sprites and no music!

It is not-well-writen and just a demo to show the idea, so play it on your own risk(of getting bored).

Title screen by Nicole Andersen (damask-dreams.tumblr.com)

Coding,  writing and stress by horusr
